Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.utils.placeholders

Class PlaceholderProcessor

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.utils.placeholders.PlaceholderProcessor
public final class PlaceholderProcessor extends Object
Handles custom placeholder processing with optional audience context.
